Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See standard-version for commit guidelines.

# 4.1.0 (2018-04-23)

Features

  • add resetOutput method (#57) (7246902)

# 4.0.0 (2017-12-18)

Bug Fixes

  • downgrades strip-ansi to version 3.0.1 (#54) (5764c46)
  • set env variable FORCE_COLOR. (#56) (7350e36)

Chores

  • drop support for node < 4 (#53) (b105376)

Features

  • add fallback for window width (#45) (d064922)

BREAKING CHANGES

  • officially drop support for Node < 4

# 3.2.0 (2016-04-11)

Bug Fixes

  • reduces tarball size (acc6c33)

Features

  • adds standard-version for release management (ff84e32)
